body: I was lagging out, and I got tempbanned for combat logging ;-;. Do I lose my xp if I get tempbanned?
body_tagged: I was lagging out, and I got tempbanned for combat logging ;-;. Do I lose my xp if I get tempbanned?
title: Please Help

replies.body: No you don't, you may appeal over email at support@avicus.net or just wait it out :) But the best thing is you do not lose your xp :)
replies.body_tagged: No you don't, you may appeal over email at support@avicus.net or just wait it out :) But the best thing is you do not lose your xp :)

replies.body: yay i don't lose xp. I'll be back in 3 days guys :D
replies.body_tagged: yay i don't lose xp. I'll be back in 3 days guys :D

replies.body: vlad when I come back I'm gonna kill you again XD. You always try to rush and I always snipe you lol.
replies.body_tagged: vlad when I come back I'm gonna kill you again XD. You always try to rush and I always snipe you lol.

replies.body: Actually, it would be a good idea to appeal the tempban. Seeing as that is now one of your infractions, staff will punish more harshly. So, if I were you, I would appeal it by emailing support@avicus.net
replies.body_tagged: Actually, it would be a good idea to appeal the tempban. Seeing as that is now one of your infractions, staff will punish more harshly. So, if I were you, I would appeal it by emailing support@avicus.net

replies.body:
Yeah, I lagged too, specialy when someone knocked me to the void, it's so bad because mods think you combat log, :/.
Try calling your internet provider ASAP!!!111
